alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Kendall; La Salle; Northern Will; Southern Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 06 at 9:07PM CST until March 07 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow and freezing drizzle or light freezing rain expected. Total wet snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a glaze up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...La Salle, Kendall, Grundy, and Northern and Southern Will Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Brief snowfall rates of one inch per hour are possible between 10 PM and 2 AM. The highest potential for freezing drizzle is between 4 and 8 AM.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.

area.areaDesc: Grundy; Kendall; La Salle; Northern Will; Southern Will
